column1: '''Bridgefields''' was one of the most easterly regions of [[the Shire]], lying within the [[Eastfarthing]].  Bridgefields was a stretch of about ten miles that lay along the [[East Road]] immediately before it reached the [[Brandywine Bridge]] and left the Shire. In the western parts of Bridgefields were the townships of [[Whitfurrows]] and, a little to the north, [[Budgeford]] on the Water.<ref>{{FR
